name: Threshold Sports Training
tag_list: training, coaching, marathon, triathlon, endurance, injury, nutrition, psychology
overview:
David Potach and Roger Earle announce the official opening of their new business, Threshold Sports Training, with last weekâ€™s launch of their website, www.thresholdsportstraining.com. Threshold Sports Training provides training for endurance events like triathlons, marathons, & 10k races. Nearly all coaching is electronic; that’s not new, but the addition of performance, nutrition, sport psychology and rehabilitation services is.

A sport nutritionist and sport psychologist join Potach and Earle as coaches. Jill Koegel, RD, LMNT, CSSD will provide a variety of nutritional services. Jason Grindstaff, PhD, CSCS, NCC is a sport psychologist offering mental conditioning services via Skype and other electronic means.

Though Threshold Sports Training has four coaches at the moment, they plan to expand both the team and their coverage over the next several months. Threshold Sports Training has been selected to provide training services for both the Omaha Triathlon and Omaha Womenâ€™s Triathlon and plans to expand on this partnership with other local, regional, national, and international events.
